summary.span: 命名空間提供型別和成員，可讓您建立 Windows (ETW) 之事件追蹤所要擷取的強型別事件。

span.span: The namespace provides types and members that enable you to create strongly typed events to be captured by event tracing for Windows (ETW).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強類型的事件名稱來識別，並包含裝載的說明。A strongly typed event is identified by name and contains payload descriptions. 您可以探索程式可藉由使用反映產生的事件清單。You can discover the list of events that a program can produce by using reflection.
